item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-18
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Noir at Charles Hotel (1 Bennett St, at Eliot, Cambridge). #
  • L.A. Confidential @ Noir #
  • I'm at Henrietta's table resturant (One Bennett Street, at The Charles Hotel n Harvard Square, Cambridge). #
  • Cabernet-Franc #
  • Second time this train has "rebooted" on the trip home. Hooray MBTA! #
  • Crab & Corn Chowder @ Henrietta's Table #
  • Proof they still make clever music videos in an age when MTV doesn't play music videos > #coldplay (via @Kneon) #
  • Cheese plate @ Henrietta's Table #
  • Rack of Lamb @ Henrietta's Table #
  • Strawberry Shortcake @ Henrietta's Table #
  • I'm at Myers Chang (1145 Washington St, East Berkley, Boston). #
  • I'm at Kickass Cupcakes (378 Highland Avenue, at Cutter, Somerville). #
  • Art Beat @ Davis Square #
  • I'm at MBTA Davis Station (90 Davis Square, Somerville). #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
